DataSource.Query: SELECT supplier_code, supplier_name, company_name, pan_number, company_address_line_1, COALESCE(contact_first_name + ' ', '') + COALESCE(contact_middle_name + ' ', '') + COALESCE(contact_last_name, '') AS contact_name, contact_phone_numbers, contact_fax FROM inventory.suppliers WHERE suppliers.deleted = 0;
